name: Nairobi National Park
description: A unique wildlife park just outside the city, home to lions, giraffes, and rhinos.

name: Karen Blixen Museum
description: Former home of the famous author of 'Out of Africa', now a museum showcasing colonial history.

name: Giraffe Centre
description: A conservation center where visitors can feed endangered Rothschild giraffes.

name: Nairobi Railway Museum
description: A tribute to Kenya's railway history with vintage locomotives and colonial-era artifacts.

name: Bomas of Kenya
description: A cultural center showcasing traditional Kenyan villages, music, and dance.

name: Uhuru Park
description: A popular urban park offering green space, paddle boats, and city views.

name: Nairobi Gallery
description: An art museum housed in a historic building, featuring contemporary Kenyan artists.

name: Maasai Market
description: A vibrant open-air market offering handmade crafts, jewelry, and textiles.
